title: Kiss Person Man Light Skin Tone Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic kiss between two men, with a combination of light and medium-dark skin tones. It signifies love, affection, and partnership, highlighting diversity.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two men in a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and realistic lighting. The skin tones are subtly shaded, showcasing Apple's commitment to inclusive representation, with a gentle blush conveying affection and romance. This emoji, with its smooth gradients and 3D gloss, perfectly captures a moment of deep connection and intimate love in digital communication.
